note:
Social media veteran, but not an expert:
infosec.space: 2024;
infosec.exchange: 2019;
twitter: 2009;
usenet: 1987.

My pronouns are he/him, though they/them are fine too.

Infosec is a minor interest, connected to privacy, which is connected to human rights. I love the world of non-corporate computing.

I was there to read 1960s SF as it was first published. Then, we thought that we would have personal AIs protecting and assisting us, not AIs feeding on us.

I have a very long list of unpopular opinions, derived from ism's such as atheism, anarchism, anti-Zionism, and vegetarianism. Also, I hate CamelCase.
